item.title: Lab reports flag packaged water produced by 8 Raichur units as unsafe
item.description: <![CDATA[Raichur: Laboratory tests have revealed that water produced by eight companies at private water packaging facilities in the district is unsuitable for drinking.The tests, conducted at the Main Divisional Food Laboratory in Mysuru, following samples sent by the Food Safety and Standards Authority of India (FSSAI), confirmed contamination. The packaging facilities that have failed the tests include one each in Manvi and Devdurg taluks, and six in Raichur.The lab test results have confirmed earlier...]]>
item.author: Tnn, Chamaraj Savadi
